item.title: One quick question about how you customize Owncast.
item.description: We’d like to know if you take advantage of the supplied HTML, Javascript and CSS to customize your page. Click to answer. Note: The poll is hosted on a 3rd party site not operated by Owncast.

item.title: 0.0.8 is released! Please read to learn more!
item.description: 0.0.8 has been released! It’s primarily focused on chat. To facilitate the changes some API updates took place that may impact you if you use any 3rd party code. Please read the changelog for the full list of changes in this update and let us know what you think of the update! API changes The websocket used for chat within Owncast will no longer be generally externally available beginning with 0.
